H0.text: Who was the Defence Lawyer in the Leopold and Loeb murder trial of 1924. William Jennings Bryan

H1.text: Who was the Defence Lawyer in the Leopold and Loeb murder trial of 1924. Earl Rogers

H2.text: Who was the Defence Lawyer in the Leopold and Loeb murder trial of 1924. Dudley Field Malone

H3.text: Who was the Defence Lawyer in the Leopold and Loeb murder trial of 1924. CLARENCE DARROW

A4.text: The Leopold and Loeb families hired the renowned criminal defense attorney Clarence Darrow to lead the defense team.
